DOC.brief_summary: Aim: To investigate whether ER stress is implicated in the pathogenesis of various pulmonary disorders Measurement: 1. Unfolded protein responses (UPRs) in blood (PBMCs)of patients 1. CHOP 2. GRP 78 and so on 2. Unfolded protein responses (UPRs) in blood (PBMCs)of healthy controls 1. CHOP 2. GRP 78 and so on
DOC.brief_title: Endoplasmic Reticulum Stress in Chronic Respiratory Diseases
DOC.criteria: > 18 yrs Definitive diagnosis as chronic pulmonary diseases by physician Any other chronic medical illness such as DM, HTN, and other malignancy
